General.Name: Hankukpackage Co. Ltd
General.Description: Hankukpackage Co., Ltd. operates as a liquid food packaging specialty company in South Korea. The company manufactures Milk Carton Pak, a liquid beverage packing container for packing milk, juice, or soft drink. Hankuk Package Co., Ltd. was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Ansan, South Korea.
